text:
Anil Swarup, Secretary, Ministry of Coal, inspecting the construction of Neyveli New Thermal Power Station on Friday. S.K. Acharya, CMD, NLC (left) is also seen. - Photo: Special Arrangement

India’s coal imports fell by 10 per cent this year due to increase in output and is on track to become self-sufficient, says Anil Swarup, Secretary, Ministry of Coal:
title: Country’s coal output on the rise: Coal Secretary
